io.netty.handler.codec.spdy

Class SpdySessionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
          • io.netty.handler.codec.spdy.SpdySessionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler

    public class SpdySessionHandler
extends ChannelDuplexHandler
    Manages streams within a SPDY session.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, ChannelPromise promise)
      Calls ChannelOutboundInvoker.close(ChannelPromise) to forward to the next ChannelOutboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Calls ChannelHandlerContext.fireExceptionCaught(Throwable) to forward to the next ChannelHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Calls ChannelHandlerContext.fireMessageReceived(MessageList) to forward to the next ChannelInboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Called once a flush operation is made and so the outbound data should be written.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpdySessionHandler

        public SpdySessionHandler(int version,
                  boolean server)
        Creates a new session handler.
        Parameters:
        version - the protocol version
        server - true if and only if this session handler should handle the server endpoint of the connection. false if and only if this session handler should handle the client endpoint of the connection.
